column4: does anyone have an idea how to activate 2 finger scrolling...
the option is greyed out on my dell mini 10v
the Dell Mini 10v doesn't support multitouch (i own one, what a great machine, btw)

from what i know, the Dell Mini 10v tocuhpad doesn't support it. But the Dell Mini 10 does. The differencie is that the Dell Mini 10v has the buttons built into the touchpad, much like Apple notebooks. Are you sure it's a Mini 10v and not a 10?
